remarks: A function in maps-to notation is a partial map .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
mptelpm.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) $.
mptelpm.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ D ) $.
mptelpm.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
mptelpm.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. W ) $.
mptelpm $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. ( C ^pm D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
